    • removeCardWagon

      public boolean removeCardWagon(Colors color, int count) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Remove some wagon cards from the player deck and the wagon associated to it
      Parameters:
      color - the color of cards to remove
      count - the number of cards to remove
      Returns:
      true if the remove is complete, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player doesn't have enough cards or enough wagon
